Pascaerte van Nieu Nederlant, Virginies, Nieu Engelant en Nova Francia. van C. of Faire tot C. Forchu

Object Name
Map
Title
Pascaerte van Nieu Nederlant, Virginies, Nieu Engelant en Nova Francia. van C. of Faire tot C. Forchu
Date
1654
Author
Jacobsz, Theunis
Author, date of birth, death
1632?-1679
Publisher
F. de Wit
Place of publication
Amsterdam, Netherlands
Holding institution
Harvard University, Harvard Map Collection
Description from holding institution
Extent 1 map; hand col.; 43 x 53 cm, on sheet 49 x 58 cm. Scale in German, Spanish, and English miles. From; Frederik de Wit. Dutch sea atlas. Amsterdam, 1654. [sheet 15]...By Theunis Iacobsz op't water inde Lootsman.
Source
digitalcollections.library.harvard.edu
